short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts the transcript of a Spotify podcast episode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For podcast episodes that offer transcripts, simply navigate to the page of the episode you want, click the 'Transcript' button on the page and then click the extension to download the transcript as a .txt.

Please note that not all podcasts on Spotify have transcripts!!
